explains: n. 流行歌曲的作者；歌曲作家

sentences.en: Twenty years ago singer-songwriter John Prine released his first album.
sentences.cn: 20 年前，创作型歌手约翰·普林发行了他的第一张专辑。

sentences.en: Sheriden was already known to Hiller as a songwriter.
sentences.cn: 在希勒看来，谢里登已经是一位词曲作家了。

sentences.en: I'm not a detective, I'm a songwriter.
sentences.cn: 我不是侦探，我只是个作曲家。
